attributes.action: Inform on Government policy for the research into, and support of, people with ME/CFS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
HELP! This condition has taken the prime years of my two son's lives.  I have written to Patricia Hewitt, and received no reply.
Am now writing to Anthony Steen PM asking for his support.In your words your admininstration is "not bovvered"
